---
title: "Introduction to Stata"
execute:
  echo: false
---

Here will be the introduction to `Stata`. Now an example of code visualization:

```{r}
 suppressMessages(library(Statamarkdown))
```

```{stata echo = 1:5}
clear all
set obs 10000
gen x = -3 + 6/(_N-1)*(_n - 1)
gen y = normalden(x)
line y x
quietly graph export "NormalDensity.png", replace
```

![Normal Density](NormalDensity.png)
